title: I was unfairly permabanned with no prior chat restrictions
body:

??? And you wonder why you went from 0 to permaban.
That's... a *lot* of hate speech. You're not getting unbanned. Riot can and will permaban first-time offenders if they're bad enough, and this was bad enough.

Incredibly toxic logs.

you are clearly too young to be playing this game and possess no self-control or respect for others. Trash was taken out, nothing of value was lost.

When you act like this, you can skip punishment levels and get deserved bans. Riot can tell just as clearly as anyone else when someone is not worth trying to reform.

"Hi guys today I got banned for no reason I could see, and it just really doesn't make sense."

*breaks every single offense of toxicity in one log*
You going zero to permaban was *completely* fair for that log... Unless you don't think it was hard enough (which I could see) in which case I'm sure Support will help you get your smurfs banned too.

Troll posted this same thread on another account not an hour ago:
[Here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/crs22dcM-i-got-permabanned-after-one-game-with-no-previous-punishments?comment=000100000000)


I would literally murder a small child for RIOT to fucking moderate the board better to remove trolls.
